channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Add Subtitle
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Add Subtitle

item.title: CVE-2021-24897|2024-08-03T19:49:13.999Z -- unknown -- add%20subtitle
item.description: The Add Subtitle WordPress plugin through 1.1.0 does not sanitise or escape the sub-title field (available only with classic editor) when output in the page, which could allow users with a role as low as contributor to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks
